title: 4x faster network file sync with rclone (vs rsync) (2025)
full_text: 4x faster network file sync with rclone (vs rsync) (2025). For the past couple years, I have transported my 'working set' of video and project data to and from work on an external Thunderbolt NVMe SSD. But it's always been slow when I do the sync. In a typical day, I may generate a new project folder with 500-1000 in….
